solution_list.title: Open Agora
solution_list.description: Open Agora centralizes all of your organization's internal communication on a single, customizable, secure and easy-to-use platform. Information is structured in dedicated groups or discussions and is accessible in real time from anywhere.

success_case_list.title: Communication improvement with Jamespot
success_case_list.description: With a growing membership number in the association, communication through mails became so complex that the association wasn’t functioning efficiently. They used  Jamespot’s collaborative solution to improve the communication flow between members because of its user friendly platform.

success_case_list.title: Replacement of an outdated solution by Jamespot's communicative platform
success_case_list.description: With a growing number of employees and new work approaches Groupe SeLoger used Jamespot's solution to replace their former platform. The solution fits well with their way of collaborate and their agile methodology used to run their projects

success_case_list.title: Communication improvement with Jamespot
success_case_list.description: They used Jamespot's solution to improve communication with their members instead of emails because of it is flexible and user-friendly.

success_case_list.title: Communication improvement with with Jamespot
success_case_list.description: With a growing membership number in the association, communication through any kind of channel was complex. After a trial with a less-known platform they decided to use Jamespot's solution instead because many features fit their needs

success_case_list.title: Communication improvement with with Jamespot
success_case_list.description: They used Jamespot solution to improve their communication which was under the form of a newsletter spread to all members. With the solution they can create work groups and provide interaction between members

success_case_list.title: Communication improvement with with Jamespot
success_case_list.description: They used Jamespot's solution because they needed to centralize in a one app all their communication flows and improve the way communication is spread through the company. With a friendly but professional platform, the solution was a good match for the company culture

success_case_list.title: Communication improvement with with Jamespot
success_case_list.description: They launched a project to implement a new multilingual collaborative solution to improve communication, information sharing and collaborative work inside the company. They chose Jamespot's solution because it was the perfect match for the company culture

solution_list.title: Fast Intranet
solution_list.description: Fast Intranet gives meaning to your internal communication by providing simplified access to information (news, reference documents, key figures ...) and information systems of your organization (HRIS, GED, CRM ...)

success_case_list.title: Better intranet platform with with Jamespot
success_case_list.description: They used Jamespot’s fast intranet solution to fulfill two objectives that their former intranet platform failed to ensure: being able to communicate with each other more easily and share document with the employees

success_case_list.title: Better intranet platform with with Jamespot
success_case_list.description: They were introduced to Jamespot because they were looking for some collaborative solutions to organize their work, documents and virtual meetings

solution_list.title: Diapazone
solution_list.description: Diapazone gathers a set of applications allowing you to prepare and animate your meetings in an efficient way, whatever your objectives (team meetings, brainstorms, etc).

solution_list.title: Wedoc
solution_list.description: Wedoc organizes the creation of your documents: edit several times and in real time, store your document in folders and find it easily by typing a keyword. It's as easy as pie
